addon.name: Order status history
addon.description: Test module shows history of order status.

queries.item: CREATE TABLE ?:order_status_history ( history_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, order_id int(11) NOT NULL, old_status varchar(20), new_status varchar(20) NOT NULL, user_id int(11) NOT NULL, timestamp int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (history_id) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8
